scripts.lambda-package: npm install --omit=dev && rm -f function.zip && zip -r function.zip . -x './.git/*'
scripts.lambda-upload: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name fmr-mastodon --zip-file fileb://function.zip --profile my-dev-profile > /tmp/linkoutput.txt
scripts.lambda: npm run lambda-package && npm run lambda-upload
